overview: Every elite crew of mercenaries put together to do a job has to include the classic character types.  The brawler. The sniper. The driver. The quirky explosives expert. The tech wiz. And of course, the guy who wears a Confederate hat for no explained reason despite living in contemporary Los Angeles. Of course, that guy is the leader, and of course, heâ€™s played by Robert Davi. Meet The Bad Pack.  Strap in for shootouts and incredibly unmotivated motorcycle stunts, and join Mike, Kevin and Bill for The Bad Pack!
tagline: Strap in for shootouts and incredibly unmotivated motorcycle stunts, and join Mike, Kevin and Bill for The Bad Pack!
title: RiffTrax: The Bad Pack
